objects.specification: Tall neutral-tone wall segment forming the back boundary of the booth, with a smooth matte surface suitable for mounting large banners or posters.
Neutral-tone side wall panel of the booth, tall and flat with a matte finish, designed to display promotional graphics without obstruction.
Neutral-tone side wall panel of the booth, tall and flat with a matte finish, designed to display promotional graphics without obstruction.
Neutral-tone front wall with a large central entrance opening cut out, providing an inviting access point while maintaining a continuous upper header for signage.
Seamless glossy showroom-style floor covering the entire booth area with a reflective finish, unifying the space and enhancing lighting effects.

Sleek modern demo car with a metallic paint finish, aerodynamic body contours, tinted windows, detailed wheels with alloy rims, and realistic surface reflections to serve as the centerpiece of the booth.
Rectangular reception desk with a contrasting vivid finish, featuring a smooth tabletop surface, clean-lined front panel, and minimalistic side panels for a modern welcome area.
Small round coffee table with a tempered glass top, slender metal legs, and a minimalist silhouette for visitor seating areas.
Modern visitor chair with a metal frame, upholstered seat and backrest in a vibrant fabric, and slender tapered legs for comfortable seating.
Modern visitor chair with a metal frame, upholstered seat and backrest in a vibrant fabric, and slender tapered legs for comfortable seating.

Large vertical fabric banner with vibrant car-themed graphics, supported by an invisible mount, designed to hang flush to the wall without collisions.
Large vertical fabric banner with vibrant car-themed graphics, supported by an invisible mount, designed to hang flush to the side wall without collisions.
